name: .GWI File Extension
summary: Learn about .GWI files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by GroupWise, a collaboration program used in professional environments; contains a pointer to a GroupWise database object; may include a user ID, version, item type, message ID, and folder path.

content: GWI files are used to save and share shortcuts to GroupWise database messages, records, and other information.
NOTE: If the object that the GWI file refers to is removed from the GroupWise database, the GWI file is no longer useful.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
